tooltip: This field is unused
Grade. Different than rank, which is the title of the grade specific for each branch
Marks the point for calculating length of service, same as Pay Entry Base Date (PEBD)
Years of creditable service
Expiration Term of Service, same as Expiration of Active Obligated Service (EAOS)
Branch of U.S. Military
Disbursing Station Symbol Number, identifies each disbursing/finance office
Pay period LES covers

Entitlements and allowances being paid. Space is allocated for fifteen line items, if more are present they will be printed in the remarks section. Any retroactive entitlements/allowances will be added to like entitlements/allowances.

Deductions being automatically taken. Space is allocated for fifteen line items, if more are present they will be printed in the remarks section. Any retroactive deductions will be added to like deductions.

Allotments being automatically taken. Space is allocated for fifteen line items, if more are present they will be printed in the remarks section. If a member has more than one of the same type of allotment, the only differentiation may be that of the dollar amount.
Amount of all unpaid entitlements and allowances due from the prior LES
Total entitlements/allowances
Total deductions
Total allotments
Total of all unpaid entitlements/allowances, plus total entitlements/allowances, minus deductions and allotments due on the current LES
Total of all unpaid entitlements/allowances due to reflect on the next LES as the +AMT FWD
Actual amount paid to the member at the end of the month
Date Initially Entered Military Service, used to calculate which retirement plan a member falls under
Type of retirement plan
Federal taxes and Federal Income Tax Withholding (FITW)
Pay earned subject to FITW
Pay earned year-to-date that is subject to FITW
Federal taxes filing status (married, single, head of household), used to compute FITW bracket
Indicator if member has multiple jobs
Number of dependents member has under 17 years old
Number of other dependents member has
Member specified dollar amount to be withheld in addition to the amount computed by marital status and exemptions
Total of other miscellaneous deductions
Total of other income member recieves if they have multiple jobs
Total of FITW taxes withheld throughout the calendar year
Federal Insurance Contributions Act taxes
Pay earned subject to FICA
Pay earned year to date subject to FICA - Social Security
Total of FICA - Social Security taxes withheld throughout the calendar year
Pay earned year-to-date subject to FICA - Medicare
Total of FICA - Medicare taxes withheld throughout the calendar year
State taxes and State Income Tax Withholding (SITW)
State used to compute tax residency
Pay earned subject to state taxes
Total of state taxes withheld throughout the calendar year
State taxes filing status (married, single), used to compute SITW
Number of exemptions used to compute SITW
Total of SITW taxes withheld throughout the calendar year
Pay data
Basic Allowance for Quarters (BAQ) type

Code indiciating type of dependent (A - Spouse, C - Child, D - Parent, G - Grandfathered, I - Member married to member/own right, K - Ward of  the court, L - Parents in Law, R - Own right, S - Student (age 21-22), T - Handicapped child over age 21, W - Member married to member, child under 21
Zip code, used to calculate Variable Housing Allowance (VHA)
Amount of rent paid for housing, if applicable
Number of people which member shares housing costs, if applicable
VHA status (accompanied or unaccompanied)
Joint Federal Travel Regulation (JFTR) code based on location of member to calculate Cost of Living Allowance (COLA)
Number of dependents member has to calculate VHA
JFTR code based on the location of the members dependents to calculate COLA

Basic Allowance of Subsistence (BAS) type, if applicable. B - Separate rations, C - TDY/PCS/Proceed time, H - Rations-in-kind not available, K - Rations under emergency conditions. This field is blank for officers
Total amount of charitable contributions throughout the calendar year
This field is currently unused by DFAS
Unit Identification Code (UIC). Army use only
Traditional Thrift Savings Plan (TSP)
Percentage of base pay elected for traditional TSP contribution
This field is currently unused by DFAS
Percentage of specialty pay elected for traditional TSP contribution
This field is currently unused by DFAS
Percentage of incentive pay elected for traditional TSP contribution
This field is currently unused by DFAS
Percentage of bonus pay elected for traditional TSP contribution
This field is currently unused by DFAS
Roth Thrift Savings Plan (TSP)
Percentage of base pay elected for roth TSP contributions
This field is currently unused by DFAS
Percentage of specialty pay elected for roth TSP contribution
This field is currently unused by DFAS
Percentage of incentive pay elected for roth TSP contribution
This field is currently unused by DFAS
Percentage of bonus pay elected for roth TSP contribution
This field is currently unused by DFAS
Contributions total
Amount of YTD TSP contributions (combined Traditional and Roth)
Amount of YTD TSP contributions deferred for tax purposes. Typically same as total Traditional TSP contributions unless contributions were made in a combat zone
Amount of YTD TSP contributions that tax exempt. TSP contributions (whether Traditional or Roth) made in a combat zone are tax-exempt
Amount of YTD TSP contributions post-tax. Typically same as total Roth TSP contributions unless contributions were made in a combat zone
Total YTD auto contributions (1%) made by the member's contributing agency.
Total YTD matched contributions (additional 1%-4%) made by the member's contributing agency. Additional percentage depends on base pay rate.
Contributing agency
Monthly auto contributions (1%) made by the member's contributing agency
Monthly matched contributions (additional 1%-4%) made by the member's contributing agency. Additional percentage depends on base pay rate.
Leave
Brought forward leave balance. Balance may be at the beginning of the fiscal year, when active duty for the member began, or the day after the member was paid a Lump Sum Leave (LSL)

Cumulative amount of leave earned in the current fiscal year or current term of enlistement if the member reenlisted/extended since the beginning of the fiscal year. Normally increases by 2.5 days each month
Amount of leave used in the current fiscal year or current term of enlistement if member reenlisted/extended since the beginning of the fiscal year
Current leave balance at the end of the LES period
Projected leave balance to the member's Expiration Term of Service (ETS)
Amount of leave days that have been lost
Amount of leave days that have been paid
Projected number of days of leave that will be lost if the member does not take them in the current fiscal year on a monthly basis. The number of days in this block will decrease with any leave usage
Amount of YTD entitlements
Amount of YTD deductions
This area is used to provide general notices
